content: the final circumference of the *garment * **gauge ** 17sts & 29 row per 4x4 square in stockinette stitch in the round & flat blocked **yardage ** 175 200 238 275 313 350 388 425 463 500 yds 160 183 218 251 286 320 355 388 423 452 m **techniques ** knitting in the round bottom up decreasing holding stitches **construction ** top knit from the bottom up **materials ** fingering yarn circular needles stitch markers removable stitch markers darning needle **helpful links** choosing a circular needle circumference 6 how to alternate skeins or work stripes in the round 7 jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind-off 8 1 https //secure actblue com/donate/ms_blm_homepage_2019 2 https //www chicagosfoodbank org 3 https //www jessiemaeddesigns com/newsletter 4 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/summersecretcrop/ 5 https //www instagram com/jessssiemae/ 6 https //www instagram com/tv/by6igmmjzes/ 7 https //www instagram com/tv/bzlbjlcdadh/ 8 https //www instagram com/tv/b0hko1bnigi/
